revisionDesc.change: Converted to P5 and hand-tidied where necessary

div.head: DIAMM in use
div.p: We are gathering information about how DIAMM is being used around the world by scholars and students. This page will list projects which take advantage of the resource, papers which have been read at conferences or published which have been made possible by, or use the DIAMM website or our images, and other related information about DIAMM's impact in the scholarly community and more broadly.
We are particularly interested in papers which you may have published or presented which draw on DIAMM resources.
If you have used DIAMM's materials in any form, please do let us know. Please get in touch with DIAMM, with a description of how you have used DIAMM resources.
